title: Overview
description: Every code machine is a NixOS system consisting of a range of Codchi modules, each corresponding to a NixOS module. So, configuring a code machine is the same as configuring a NixOS system, without you having to worry about hardware configuration.

title: Secrets
description: Sometimes there is the need for user-specific variables and / or secrets, which should not be included inside the .nix files inside a git repository, but they're still needed for the development environment. An example is a GitHub / GitLab token which is used to automatically setup mail and username for Git's config.
